summary: Failed magician Iskender decides to do a tour to save his career, but has to bring his grumpy and senile father along. The tour is quite unexpectedly interrupted when a bride actually disappears from the stage.
cast: Cem Yilmaz|Mazhar Alanson|Özlem Tekin|Tuna Orhan|Tuncer Salman|Kemal Inci|Gürgen Öz|Caner Alkaya|Ayçe Abana|Bahtiyar Engin|Ozan Uygun|Onuryay Evrentan|Suat Önen|Selim Erdogan|Gamze Demirbilek|Sennur Kaya|Ali Saribas|Orhan Eskin|Müfit Aytekin|Ezgi Mola|Metin Keçeci|Can Yilmaz|Seyhan Kaya|Fevzi Müftüoglu|Yagmur Akpinar|Sinasi Yurtsever|Tevfik Yapici|Funda Cansever|Levent Intepe|Bahri Beyat|Ipek Bilgin|Gökçe Eris|Aygun Tevfik Hicyilmaz|Ezgi Kahvecioglu|Fatma Salli|Ünal Silver|Arzu Suriçi|Bengisu Özkaya
director: Directors: Ali Taner Baltaci, Cem Yilmaz
title: Hokkabaz
